mapper.select: SELECT A.CODE , A.CODE_KNM FROM COM_CODE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CD_GRP_ENM = #{cd_grp_enm} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.USER_ID , (SELECT USER_KOR_NM FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID) AS USER_KOR_NM , A.BOARD_DIV_CD , CASE WHEN A.CHG_DT IS NULL OR A.CHG_DT = '' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.WRITE_DT, 3, 2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.WRITE_DT, 5, 2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.WRITE_DT, 7, 2)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 3, 2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 5, 2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 7, 2)) END WRITE_DT , D.FAVORIT_CNT , C.REAL_FILE_NM , CONCAT(C.FILE_PATH,C.REAL_FILE_NM) AS IMG_PATH , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_DIV_CD = A.BOARD_DIV_CD AND BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO AND CLICK_DIV_CD = '02' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND CLICK_USER_ID = #{click_user_id} ) AS FAVORIT_YN_OF_CLICK_USER , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CNTN , A.BIBLE_INDEX_CNTN , A.SELECT_CNT , A.VIDEO_DIV_CD , B.SOCIAL_PROFILE_URL , B.USER_KOR_NM , B.USER_NIC_NM , A.VIDEO_ID , A.PHOTO_ID , A.YOUTUBE_IFRM_SRC , A.DEL_YN , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_DT FROM BOARD A INNER JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND BOARD_DIV_CD = #{board_div_cd} AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no} LEFT JOIN FILE_UPLOAD_INFO C ON A.PHOTO_ID = C.FILE_ID CROSS JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) AS FAVORIT_CNT FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_DIV_CD = #{board_div_cd} AND CLICK_DIV_CD = '02' AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) D

SELECT A.BOARD_DIV_CD , A.BOARD_NO , A.REPLY_NO , CASE WHEN A.RE_REPLY_NO IS NULL OR A.RE_REPLY_NO = '' THEN CONCAT(A.REPLY_NO,'_0') ELSE CONCAT(A.REPLY_NO,'_',A.RE_REPLY_NO) END AS REPLY_NO_ID , A.RE_REPLY_NO , CASE WHEN A.CHG_DT IS NULL OR A.CHG_DT = '' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.WRITE_DT, 1, 4),'-',SUBSTRING(A.WRITE_DT, 5, 2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.WRITE_DT, 7, 2)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 1, 4),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 5, 2),'-',SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 7, 2)) END WRITE_DT , CASE WHEN A.CHG_DT IS NULL OR A.CHG_DT = '' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.REG_DT, 9, 2),':',SUBSTRING(A.REG_DT, 11, 2)) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 9, 2),':',SUBSTRING(A.CHG_DT, 11, 2)) END TIME , A.USER_ID , B.USER_KOR_NM , B.SOCIAL_PROFILE_URL , A.REPLY_CNTN , A.DEL_YN , A.CHG_USER_ID , A.CHG_DT , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_DT FROM ( SELECT BOARD_DIV_CD , BOARD_NO , REPLY_NO , '' AS RE_REPLY_NO , WRITE_DT , USER_ID , CASE WHEN DEL_YN = 'Y' THEN '삭제 된 내용 입니다.' ELSE REPLY_CNTN END AS REPLY_CNTN , DEL_YN , CHG_USER_ID , CHG_DT , REG_USER_ID , REG_DT FROM BOARD_REPLY WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_DIV_CD = #{board_div_cd} AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no} UNION ALL SELECT BOARD_DIV_CD , BOARD_NO , REPLY_NO , RE_REPLY_NO , WRITE_DT , USER_ID , CASE WHEN DEL_YN = 'Y' THEN '삭제 된 내용 입니다.' ELSE RE_REPLY_CNTN END AS RE_REPLY_CNTN , DEL_YN , CHG_USER_ID , CHG_DT , REG_USER_ID , REG_DT FROM BOARD_RE_REPLY WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_DIV_CD = #{board_div_cd} AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no} ) A INNER JOIN USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARD_DIV_CD = #{board_div_cd} AND A.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} ORDER BY CAST(A.REPLY_NO AS UNSIGNED), CAST(A.RE_REPLY_NO AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) != 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DUB_YN FROM USER_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMAIL_ADDR = #{email_addr} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT USER_ID /* 사용자ID */ , EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , USER_KOR_NM AS USER_NM /* 사용자이름 */ , USER_NIC_NM /* 사용자닉네임 */ , PASSWORD /* 사용자비밀번호 */ , PHONE_NUM /* 휴대전화번호 */ , ROLE_CD /* 권한코드 */ , (SELECT CODE_KNM FROM COM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CD_GRP_ENM = 'ROLE_CD' AND CODE = A.ROLE_CD ) AS ROLE_NM /* 권한명 */ , CHURCH_ROLE_CD /* 교회직분코드 */ , SOCIAL_PROFILE_URL /* 소셜 프로필 이미지 */ , USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ , REG_USER_ID /* 등록사용자ID */ , REG_DT /* 등록일자 */ FROM USER_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMAIL_ADDR = #{email_addr} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' /* 사용여부 */ AND A.AUTH_YN = 'Y' /* 메일인증여부 */

SELECT USER_ID /* 사용자ID */ , EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , USER_KOR_NM AS USER_NM /* 사용자이름 */ , USER_NIC_NM /* 사용자닉네임 */ , PASSWORD /* 사용자비밀번호 */ , PHONE_NUM /* 휴대전화번호 */ , ROLE_CD /* 권한코드 */ , (SELECT CODE_KNM FROM COM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CD_GRP_ENM = 'ROLE_CD' AND CODE = A.ROLE_CD ) AS ROLE_NM /* 권한명 */ , CHURCH_ROLE_CD /* 교회직분코드 */ , SOCIAL_PROFILE_URL /* 소셜 프로필 이미지 */ , USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ , REG_USER_ID /* 등록사용자ID */ , REG_DT /* 등록일자 */ FROM USER_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMAIL_ADDR = #{email} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' /* 사용여부 */ AND A.AUTH_YN = 'Y' /* 메일인증여부 */

SELECT USER_ID /* 사용자ID */ , EMAIL_ADDR /* 이메일주소 */ , USER_KOR_NM AS USER_NM /* 사용자이름 */ , USER_NIC_NM /* 사용자닉네임 */ , PASSWORD /* 사용자비밀번호 */ , PHONE_NUM /* 휴대전화번호 */ , ROLE_CD /* 권한코드 */ , (SELECT CODE_KNM FROM COM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CD_GRP_ENM = 'ROLE_CD' AND CODE = A.ROLE_CD ) AS ROLE_NM /* 권한명 */ , CHURCH_ROLE_CD /* 교회직분코드 */ , SOCIAL_PROFILE_URL /* 소셜 프로필 이미지 */ , USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ , REG_USER_ID /* 등록사용자ID */ , REG_DT /* 등록일자 */ FROM USER_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET AUTH_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
